system.description: Choose one type of weapon for which you have already selected the Weapon Focus feat. You deal extra damage when using this weapon.
system.prerequisites: Proficient with weapon, Weapon Focus with chosen weapon, fighter level 4th
system.benefit: You gain a +2 bonus on all damage rolls you make using the selected weapon.
system.special: You can gain Weapon Specialization multiple times. Each time you take the feat, it applies to a new type of weapon. A fighter may select Weapon Specialization as one of his fighter bonus feats.
